You will gradually begin to 
recognise when your baby is 
ready for sleep and is likely 
to settle. Some babies settle 
better after a warm bath. Most 
sleep after a good feed. A 
baby who wants to sleep is 
not likely to be disturbed by 
ordinary household noises, 
so there is no need to keep
